projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: yaśca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ //
yadi te 'ham anugrāhyā yadyahaṃ tava vallabhā //
sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā devi bhaktānāṃ hitakāmyayā //
piṇḍe tu patite devi gardabho 'pi vimucyate //
dharme naṣṭe kuto dharmaḥ dharme naṣṭe kutaḥ kriyā //
gatinaṣṭe kuto mokṣo mokṣe naṣṭe na kiṃcana //
tatpratyupāyaṃ me brūhi yadyasti karuṇā mayi //
baddhaḥ khecaratāṃ kuryāt raso vāyuśca bhairavi //
tatra devi sthiraṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra sthairye rasaḥ prabhuḥ //
na sidhyati raso devi pibanti mṛgatṛṣṇikām //
tenāyaṃ labhate siddhiṃ na siddhiḥ sūtakaṃ vinā //
tāvattasya kuto muktiḥ kutaḥ piṇḍasya dhāraṇam //
jalpanti ca vayaṃ muktā yāsyāmaḥ śivamandiram //
tādṛśe tu rasajñāne nityābhyāsaṃ kuru priye //
tāni dṛṣṭvā tu yatpuṇyaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ rasadarśanāt //
āstike tu bhavetsiddhiḥ tasya sidhyati bhūtale //
sa yāti niṣphalaṃ karma svapnalabdhaṃ dhanaṃ yathā //
kārayed rasavādaṃ tu tuṣṭena guruṇā priye //

div.head: Dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ [Dīkṣāvidhāna]

lg.l: dharmajñaḥ satyavāk dakṣaḥ śīlavān guṇavān śuciḥ //
rañjanaṃ sāraṇaṃ tailaṃ dalāni krāmaṇāni ca //
khecarīṃ bhūcarīṃ caiva yo vetti sa gururmataḥ //
rasanindākarī yā ca tāṃ nārīṃ parivarjayet //
kṛṣṇapakṣe ṛtumatī sā nārī kākiṇī smṛtā //
ubhayapakṣe ṛtumatī sā nārī kīkaṇī matā //
sūkṣmakeśā tu yā nārī kṣīrāhārapriyā sadā //
yasyāḥ payodharau devi tuṅgapīnau samāv ubhau //
padminī sā tu vijñeyā prasannā mṛgalocanā //
yatra rūpaṃ mahādeva lakṣaṇaṃ nātra vidyate //
baddhvā tu khecarīṃ mudrāṃ japet pheṭkārabhairavīm //
rasadīkṣāṃ tu pṛcchāmi sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai //
janā māheśvarā yatra tatra sthāne tu kārayet //
oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ sūtarājasya mūlamantra udāhṛtaḥ //
caturasre tu dikpālān pūjayitvā bahiḥ kramāt //
kumbhakarṇaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ bhṛṅgīkaṃ ca dṛḍhāyudham //
raseśvarasya mantraṃ ca kathyamānaṃ nibodha me //

div.p: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ raseśvarāya mahākālāya mahābalāyāghorabhairavāya vajravīra krodhakaṅkāla kṣlauḥ kṣlaḥ ||

lg.l: vāgbhavaṃ bhuvaneśīṃ ca śrībījaṃ ca sureśvari //
sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi trisaṃdhyaṃ saṃjapedimām //
nyaset krodhaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ mālāmantraiḥ samarcayet //

div.p: oṃ hrīṃ krauṃ kṣlaiṃ kṣlaṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ hrūḥ huṃ phaṭ raseśvarāya mahākālabhairavāya raudrarūpāya kṛṣṇapiṅgalalocanāya | avatara 2 avatāraya 2 jalpa 2 jalpaya 2 śubhāśubhaṃ kathaya 2 kathāpaya 2 mahārakṣāṃ kuru 2 rasasiddhiṃ dehi | iti mālāmantrāḥ | oṃ mahākālabhairavāya hṛdayāya namaḥ | oṃ mahābalabhairavāya śirase svāhā | oṃ aghorabhairavāya śikhāyai vauṣaṭ | oṃ vajravīrabhairavāya kavacāya hum | oṃ krodhabhairavāya netrāya vauṣaṭ | oṃ kaṅkālabhairavāya astrāya phaṭ | sarvatra svāhāntam | evamaṅganyāsāḥ | evamaṅgulīnyāsān kuryādādau | ete ṣaḍaṅge pūjane ca mūlamantrāḥ |

lg.l: saptajanma mṛto jāto na tyajed rasabhāvanam //
aghoreṇa baliṃ dattvā tataḥ karma samācaret //
sadyojātaṃ tasya jānu vāmadevaṃ tu guhyakam //
śūnyaṃ śūnyaṃ punaḥ śūnyaṃ triśūnyaṃ ca nirāmayam //
yadā ca calati dhyānaṃ raso vahnau na tiṣṭhati //
sampūjya viniyuñjyāt tat siddhadravyaṃ tu siddhidam //
nāryai guhyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ dravyaṃ tābhyo hi gopayet //
parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta parāṃścaiva na viśvaset //
na tatra rogadaurgatyaṃ netayaḥ prabhavanti ca //
apāyaḥ pāpaśaṅkā ca buddhibhaṅgo hi jāyate //
pañcamaṃ tu gṛhaṃ devi durlabhaṃ devadānavaiḥ //
yatra siddhir makārādiḥ tiṣṭhate pañcame gṛhe //
gaganena tu sā jñeyā bhagarekhā tu pañcame //
anena mārjayet kṣetraṃ rasendro yatra tiṣṭhati //
pūrve gṛhe tu sā devī caṇḍaghaṇṭā vyavasthitā //
tāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃkarāstasya auṣadhaṃ peṣayanti tāḥ //
sā vidyā khecarīṇāṃ tu nāmnāṃ tu kulakhecarī //
guḍeṣṭakāṃ tu saṃmardya priye tanmarditaṃ rasam //
ṣaḍaṅgaṃ yojayet tāṃ tu tvaritaṃ dhārayet tataḥ //
tadā tu sidhyate tasya sādhakasya phalaṃ priye //
trailokyaṃ kṣobhitāste tu na manyante mama priye //
kiṃ karoti mahādeva tāni me vaktumarhasi //
saṃdhiṃ vilepayedyatnāt mṛdā vastreṇa caiva hi //
mūṣālepaṃ tataḥ kuryāt tale piṣṭīṃ ca nikṣipet //
ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ vā rasendro bhasmatāṃ vrajet //
ekānte tu kriyā kāryā dṛṣṭānyairviphalā bhavet //
mahāgniṃ sahate hy eṣa sārito yatra tiṣṭhati //
ādyā śreṣṭhā kaniṣṭhāntyā madhyamā madhyamā matā //
ajāśvānāṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ yāvattat kṛṣṇatāṃ gatam //
prakāśā cāndhamūṣā ca mūṣā tu dvividhā smṛtā //
śaile tu dhūsarā devi āyase kapilaprabhā //
mūṣāgataṃ ratnasamaṃ sthiraṃ ca tadā viśuddhaṃ pravadanti loham //
abhiṣekaṃ tadicchanti snapanaṃ kriyate tu yat //
uṣṇenaiva hi vāñchanti śītalaṃ na ca vāñchati //
lohāvartaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sattvaṃ patati nirmalam //
bakagalasamamānaṃ vaṅkanālaṃ vidheyaṃ śuṣiranalinikā syānmṛnmayī dīrghavṛttā //
sa ca lohamayaḥ śailo hy ayaskāntamayo 'thavā //
yayā sampadyate hy eṣām oṣadhīṃ vaktumarhasi //
tittiḍī kṣīriṇī rāsnā meṣaśṛṅgī ca kukkuṭī //
śṛgālajihvā bṛhatī vajrā cakrī ca rājikā //
doṣān haranti yogina dhātūnāṃ pāradasya ca //
ityaṣṭa mūlikāḥ proktāḥ pañcaratnaṃ śṛṇu priye //
sauvarcalaṃ ca kācaṃ ca lavaṇāḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ //
śṛṅgī kṛṣṇaviṣaṃ caiva pañcaite tu mahāviṣāḥ //

div.head: Ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ [Abhrakādilakṣaṇasaṃskāranirṇaya]

lg.l: pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā śuklaṃ raktaṃ bhūmeśca saṃgamāt //
pināke 'gniṃ praviṣṭe tu śabdaś ciṭiciṭir bhavet //
agniṃ praviṣṭaṃ nāgaṃ tu phūtkāraṃ devi muñcati //
agniṃ praviṣṭaṃ vajraṃ tu vajravattiṣṭhati priye //
nāgaṃ dehagataṃ nityaṃ vyādhiṃ kuryād bhagaṃdaram //
tārakarmaṇi śuklaṃ ca kācakiṭṭaṃ sadā tyajet //
snuhikṣīreṇa saptāhaṃ siktaṃ dhmātaṃ drutaṃ bhavet //
bhāvayecca tathā tena yāvaccūrṇaṃ tato bhavet //
abhrakasya yutaṃ cūrṇaṃ dhmātaṃ mūṣāgataṃ dravat //
pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ trivarṇaṃ syāt pṛthak pṛthak //
rase rasāyane caiva karṣakaṃ drāvakaṃ hitam //
tenaiva kṣālanaṃ kāryyaṃ pañcaniṣkaṃ tu ṭaṅkaṇam //
napuṃsakāḥ sattvahīnāḥ kaṣṭaṃ lohe kramanti ca //
klībe klīvāḥ striyaḥ strīṇāṃ sarbbeṣāṃ puruṣā hitāḥ //
yathā varastathā varṇaṃ kurvanti kuliśāḥ priye //
andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt //
tenaiva militaṃ vajraṃ tārahemni na saṃśayaḥ //
mūṣālepagataṃ dhmātaṃ vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt //
tatkalkapuṭitaṃ dhmātaṃ vajraṃ caiva mṛtaṃ bhavet //
andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt //
kṣiptaṃ bahirmṛdā liptaṃ mriyate saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ //
veṣṭitaṃ kuliśaṃ devi puṭapākāt mṛtaṃ bhavet //
anena veṣṭitaṃ vajraṃ mriyate saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ //
tatkṣaṇānmriyate vajraṃ tāre hemni na saṃśayaḥ //
tadvajraṃ jāyate khoṭaṃ hemnā milati tatkṣaṇāt //
jānumadhye sthitaṃ yāmaṃ mṛdu saṃjāyate dhruvam //
jalabhāṇḍe tu tat svinnaṃ saptāhaṃ dravatāṃ vrajet //
vāpitaṃ sakṛd ekena mṛtaṃ jalasamaṃ bhavet //
durgā bhagavatī devī taṃ śūlena vyamardayat //
tatra tatra tu vaikrānto vajrākāro mahārasaḥ //
śeṣe dve niṣphale varjye vaikrāntamiti saptadhā //
andhanāle dhamitvā tu mūṣāsattvaṃ tu jāyate //

div.trailer: iti śrīpārvatīparameśvarasaṃvāde rasārṇave rasasaṃhitāyām abhrakādilakṣaṇasaṃskāranirṇayo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ

lg.l: mūṣāyāṃ muñcati dhmātaṃ sattvaṃ śulvanibhaṃ mṛdu //
prakaṭāṃ mūṣikāṃ kṛtvā dhamet sattvam apekṣitam //
vātāritailena puṭena tāpyaṃ puṭena dagdhaṃ varaśuddhim eti //
piṇḍaṃ baddhvā tu vidhivat pātayeccapalaṃ yathā //
vastraṃ ca veṣṭayet sadyaḥ tenāsau capalaḥ smṛtaḥ //
krameṇa kṛtvā uragena rañjitaṃ karoti śulbaṃ tripuṭena kāñcanam //
svayaṃ vinirgate cañcvoḥ sasyako 'bhūt sa kālikaḥ //
rasāyane tu yogyaḥ syād vayaḥstambhakaro bhavet //
sattvaṃ tu sūtasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
tatra tyaktvā tu tadvāsaḥ susnātā kṣīrasāgare //
ye guṇāḥ pārade proktās te caivātra bhavantviti //
kṣipraṃ bhṛṅgasya niryāse kṣālito gandhako hitaḥ //
kuṣmāṇḍe tu śataṃ vārān tālakaṃ svedayedbudhaḥ //
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ ca yutairhyetaiḥ tālakaṃ bhūdhare dravet //
dadyāt puṭaṃ gajākāraṃ patet sattvaṃ sutālakāt //
sitā kṛṣṇā ca saurāṣṭrī cūrṇakhaṇḍātmikā ca sā //
kāsīsaṃ trividhaṃ śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pītamiti priye //
kramāt sitaṃ ca raktaṃ ca sattvaṃ patati śobhanam //
evaṃ śilābhyo jīvebhyo mṛdbhyaḥ sattvaṃ prajāyate //
evaṃ coparasāḥ proktāḥ śṛṇu lohānyataḥ param //
lohaṃ tu ṣaḍvidhaṃ tacca yathā pūrvaṃ tadakṣayam //
dāhe raktaṃ sitaṃ chede nikaṣe kuṅkumaprabham //
iti tīkṣṇaṃ tridhā tacca kāntalohamiti smṛtam //
śvetaṃ laghu mṛdu snigdham uttamaṃ vaṅgamucyate //
niṣekaḥ sarvalohānāṃ malaṃ hanti na saṃśayaḥ //
drāvayet kanakaṃ vāpāt bhūyo na kaṭhinaṃ bhavet //
lohalepaṃ tato dadyāt agnisthaṃ dhārayet priye //
kadalī potakī dālī kṣārameṣāṃ tu sādhayet //
ratnānāṃ drāvaṇaṃ vakṣye gaganasya drutiṃ tathā //
balā cātibalā caiva tṛtīyā ca mahābalā //
tair drutaiḥ sparśamātreṇa kṣaṇād badhyeta sūtakaḥ //
nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ suvīraṃ ca dravyakarmaṇi yojayet //
rāgasaṃkhyāṃ tathā bījasādhanaṃ ca vada prabho //
giridoṣe kṣayaṃ nīte sūtakaṃ rañjayanti te //
vimalo gairikaṃ caiṣām ekaikaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet //
śatahīnaṃ sahasraṃ tu vaṅge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ //
mahānīle ca deveśi te rāgā dviguṇāḥ sthitāḥ //
tadvajraṃ tasya deveśi rāgaṃ lakṣadvayaṃ viduḥ //
kalpitaṃ rañjitaṃ pakvam iti bhūyastridhā bhavet //
śuddhaṃ miśraṃ tu saṃyogāt yathālābhaṃ sureśvari //
bhavet samarasaṃ garbhe rasarājasya ca dravet //
vaṅgābhraṃ haritālaṃ ca nāgābhre tu manaḥśilāḥ //
khasattvaṃ syānnibaddhaṃ ca dṛḍhaṃ dhmātaṃ milettataḥ //
anyonyaṃ dvaṃdvatāṃ yānti dravanti salilaṃ yathā //
kurute triguṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ lākṣābhaṃ nirmalaṃ rasam //
kṛṣṇābhrakasya cūrṇaṃ ca raktavargair muhuḥ puṭaiḥ //
drutaṃ hemanibhaṃ sūtaṃ kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ //
gairikeṇa ca mukhyena rasakena ca rañjayet //
nāgo nirjīvatāṃ yāti puṭayogaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
āvartitaṃ cūrṇitaṃ ca māritaṃ saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ //
mākṣikeṇa hataṃ tacca bīje nirvāhayet priye //
vāpitaṃ pītatāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kāntasthāṃ kālikāṃ viṣam //
pakvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ samaṃ garbhe yaddravedrañjayecca tam //
jāryante tāni yaiḥ sūte tān viḍān vaktumarhasi //
śataśo vā plutaṃ cūrṇaṃ gandhakasya gavāṃ jalaiḥ //
dagdhakāṇḍais tilānāṃ tu pañcāṅgaṃ mūlakasya ca //
saptāhaṃ bhūgataḥ paścād dhānyasthaḥ pravaro viḍaḥ //
śakyate na mayā vaktuṃ saṃkṣepāt kathyate śṛṇu //
śarīre hemni kartā ca jāraṇe sāraṇāsu ca //
taṃ vidyāt pāradaṃ devi tārakarmaṇi yojayet //
tathā hema śarīraṃ ca pāradena vinaśyati //
iti yo vetti tattvena tasya sidhyati sūtakaḥ //
sa tāvajjīvayejjīvaṃ tena jīvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ //
catasro gatayo dṛśyā adṛśyā pañcamī gatiḥ //
niyamito na prayāti tathā dhūmagatiṃ śive //
jāyate niścitaṃ bhadre tadā tasya gatitrayam //
svedanaṃ ca tataḥ karma dīyamānasya mardanam //
krāmaṇena samāyuktaṃ taṃ ca vedhe niyojayet //
māṣā dvādaśa tolaḥ syāt aṣṭau tolāḥ palaṃ bhavet //
śubhasya tu sahasre dve bhāra ekaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
aṣṭāviṃśat palānāṃ tu daśa pañcakameva vā //
nirudgāre tu pāṣāṇe mardayet pātayet punaḥ //
yāvanna jāryate sūtaḥ tāvattu na ca nirvṛtiḥ //
mardanaṃ vandanaṃ tasya grāsaḥ pūjā vidhīyate //
dravanti tasya pāpāni kurvannapi na lipyate //
sitaṃ sitena dravyeṇa raktaṃ raktena rañjayet //
sāraṇaṃ krāmaṇaṃ jñātvā tato vedhaṃ prayojayet //
jāraṇaṃ kartumicchāmi grāsaṃ gṛhṇa mama prabho //
ekaikaṃ trividhaṃ tacca tad vakṣyāmy ānupūrvaśaḥ //
hemakarmaṇi hemaiva tāre tāro mukhaṃ bhavet //
jāraṇārthaṃ ca bījānāṃ vajrāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
kṣārāmle bhāvitaṃ vyoma rajasā prathamena ca //
śigruko yavaciñcā ca bhāvitaṃ tadrasaiḥ kramāt //
navavāraṃ tato devi lohapātre tu jārayet //
kalkena lepayet sūtaṃ gaganaṃ ca tadūrdhvagam //
jāyate piṣṭikā śīghraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
tenābhrakaṃ tu saṃplāvya bhūyobhūyaḥ puṭe dahet //
caturguṇaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ samaṃ vā cārayet priye //
yantrād uddhṛtamātraṃ tu lohapātre sthitaṃ rasam //
ṣoḍaśāṃśaiḥ sa dhānyāmlaiḥ mardyaḥ svedyaśca pāradaḥ //
vṛddhastu ṣaḍguṇaṃ jīrṇaḥ kuryāt karma pṛthak pṛthak //
yauvanastho raso devi kṣamo dehasya rakṣaṇe //
sauvarcalaṃ ca kāsīsaṃ sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ tathā //
viḍacūrṇaṃ tato dattvā kanakaṃ jārayet priye //
śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi bhūcarākhyaṃ tu jāraṇam //
kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ raktamabhraṃ śulve tīkṣṇe ca melayet //
gandhanāgaṃ tato 'rdhaṃ tu krameṇaiva tu melayet //
puṭena mārayecchuddhaṃ hema dadyāt tu ṣaḍguṇam //
bhūcarī jāraṇā proktā khecarīṃ jāraṇāṃ śṛṇu //
padmarāgaṃ prayatnena rase grāsaṃ tu dāpayet //
samaṃ kṛṣṇābhrasattvaṃ ca rasakaṃ cāṣṭakaṃ guṇam //
bhūrje dattvā tato deyaṃ dolāyantre vinikṣipet //
tato garbhe patatyāśu jārayet tat sukhena tu //
tṛtīye divase sūto jarate grasate tataḥ //
puṭettu jāritastāvat yāvat kando na dahyate //
tataḥ śalākayā grāsān agnistho grasate rasaḥ //
tāvattaṃ mardayet prājño yāvat karma dṛḍhaṃ bhavet //
gṛhyate ko 'tra saṃdeho yathā tīvre hutāśane //
muktāphalaṃ tato deyaṃ vajrajīrṇe tu sūtake //
bhūcaraṃ taṃ vijānīyāt rasendraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
sāritaṃ jārayet paścāt lepyaṃ kṣepyaṃ sahasraśaḥ //
mūṣāsthaṃ dhamayet sūtaṃ haṭhāgnau naiva kampate //
dviguṇe śatavedhī syāt triguṇe tu sahasrakam //
jāritaṃ pannage sūtaṃ samāṃśaṃ śilayā hatam //
gandhanāge drute devi jāraṇāṃ sukarāṃ śṛṇu //
ūrdhvaṃ gandhakacūrṇaṃ ca tato nāgadalaṃ tathā //
ūrdhvaṃ prasārya saṃsthāpya sūtrairvartiṃ tu kārayet //
dīptāgrabhāgāṃ tāṃ vartiṃ saṇḍaśyā tu vidhārayet //
kācakūpyāśca madhye tu tattailaṃ sthāpayet priye //
caturbindūn puṭe prāgvad evaṃ pratidinaṃ bhavet //
kalkena liptaṃ puṭitaṃ bījaṃ garbhe drutaṃ bhavet //
tridine kacchape jāryam evaṃ jāryaṃ tu ṣaḍguṇam //
tameva samajīrṇaṃ tu vahnau niṣkampanaṃ rasam //
lakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate yasya mūrchitaṃ taṃ vadanti hi //
haṭhāgnau dhāmitāḥ santi na tiṣṭhatyeva mūrchitaḥ //
krāmaṇaṃ ca tato deyaṃ sūtakasya vicakṣaṇaiḥ //
evaṃ kramaṃ tu yo vetti tasya siddhirna saṃśayaḥ //
tasya janma jarā vyādhir naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
dehalohāmayān sarvān vṛthā syāt kevalaṃ śramaḥ //
oṣadhyā ghātitaḥ sūto yathā bhūyo na jīvati //
kena vā bhasmasūtaḥ syāt kena vā khoṭabandhanam //
adho niṣpīḍitaṃ devi raso bhavati cottamaḥ //
āroṭaṃ bandhayet kṣipraṃ gaganaṃ tatra jārayet //
yantre vidyādhare devi gaganaṃ tatra jārayet //
bhāvayet saptavāraṃ tu dvipadyāśca rasena tu //
taṃ raviṃ tāramadhye tu triguṇaṃ vāhayettataḥ //
punastaṃ gandhakaṃ sākṣād drāvayitvā drutaṃ kuru //
tenaiva ghātayedvaṅgaṃ vaṅgaṃ tāre tu nirvahet //
daśāṃśaṃ vedhayet sūtaṃ daśa pītaṃ śatena ca //
daśāṃśaṃ koṭivedhi syāt koṭivedhi samena ca //
lakṣavedhī rasaḥ sākṣād aṣṭau lohāni kāñcanam //
naṣṭacchāyo hy adṛśyaśca trailokyaṃ ca bhramedrasaiḥ //
anena ghātayet sūtaṃ pañcāvasthaṃ kuru priye //
tāre tāmre 'pi vā devi bhāvayettaṃ manaḥśilām //
tāre tāmre 'pi vā devi koṭivedhī bhavedrasaḥ //
drāvayedgaganaṃ devi tīkṣṇaṃ lohaṃ ca pannagam //
svarase mardayet paścāt pannagaṃ devi secayet //
ravighṛṣṭaṃ tu taṃ devi pannagaṃ triguṇaṃ priye //
tadbhasma tāmrapiṣṭaṃ tu triguṇaṃ tena nirvahet //
tārahema samāṃśaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ pittalaṃ bhavet //
taṃ rasaṃ rasakaṃ caiva tīkṣṇaṃ lohaṃ ca pannagam //
daśavāraṃ niṣiktaṃ tu bhasmākāraṃ hi jāyate //
koṭivedhī raso devi lohānyaṣṭau ca vidhyati //
same tu gagane jīrṇe baddhastiṣṭhati sūtakaḥ //
dviguṇe gagane jīrṇe aṣṭau lohāni saṃharet //
jārayedgandhakaṃ sā tu jārayet sāpi tālakam //
vajraṃ ca ghātayet sā tu sarvasattvaṃ ca pātayet //
same tu kanake jīrṇe daśakoṭīstu vedhayet //
navame śabdavedhī syād ata ūrdhvaṃ na vidyate //
akṣayaṃ ca varārohe vahnimadhye na tiṣṭhati //

l.seg: na khoṭo na ca vā bhasma

lg.l: kiṃ tat dravyaṃ prakurvīta dhāmyamāno na tiṣṭhati //
na vedhaṃ ca śatād ūrdhvaṃ karoti sa rasaḥ priye //
nirjīvena tu nirjīvaḥ kathaṃ jīvati śaṃkara //
aṣṭānāṃ caiva lohānāṃ malaṃ śamayati kṣaṇāt //
gajendrākhyaṃ puṭaṃ dattvā saptadhā baddhatāṃ nayet //
bhakṣayet taṃ rasaṃ prājñaḥ ṣaṇmāsādamaro bhavet //
tasyā mūle tu nikṣiptaṃ kṣīraṃ raktaṃ bhavet priye //
ekameva bhavennālaṃ tasya roma tu veṣṭanam //
tathā śulvasya pattrāṇi vedhyaṃ jāmbunadaṃ bhavet //
bhaṅge caiva bhavet kṣīraṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam //
kharpare dhārayitvā tu bhāvayettu punaḥ punaḥ //
kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ sitaṃ vāpi hemante noddharedbudhaḥ //
tasya tailaṃ samādāya kumbhe tāmramaye kṣipet //
ṣaṇmāse tu vyatikrānte sa ghaṭaḥ kāñcanaṃ bhavet //
prativāpe niṣiñcet tat hema tāmrasamaṃ bhavet //
sahasraṃ vedhayitvā tu kāñcanaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt //
bhūgataṃ māsamekaṃ tu tāraṃ kāñcanatāṃ nayet //
śulvasya pañcabhāgaṃ ca bījasyaikaṃ ca yojayet //
sthānasyāsya niṣekaṃ tu bhūdaṇḍena tu kārayet //
tadrasena yutaṃ prājñaḥ saptarātraṃ tu bhāvayet //
sā śvetā vyādhināśe ca kṛṣṇā pītā rasāyane //
mūrchayed bandhayet kṣipraṃ śulvaṃ hema karoti ca //
toyena marditaṃ kṛtvā vaṅgaṃ stambhayati kṣaṇāt //
kapāle mṛttikāṃ nyasya secayet salilena tu //

div.p: namo bhagavati śvetavalli śvetaparvatavāsini sarvakāryāṇi kuru kuru apratihate namo namaḥ svāhā |

lg.l: devānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ devi jāyate hema śobhanam //
ayaṃ ca sparśamātreṇa lohānyaṣṭau ca vedhayet //

div.p: oṃ namo rudrāya daṃṣṭrotkaṭāya vighnanāśāya diśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa vidiśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa rudro vijñāpayati huṃ phaṭ svāhā | oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya triśūlahastāya amṛtodbhavāya rakṣa rakṣa phaṭ svāhā |

lg.l: te bhūmau patitā divyāḥ saṃjātāḥ kartarīrasaḥ //
keśāḥ kṣiptāḥ sphuṭantyasmin ātmacchāyā na dṛśyate //
viṣodakaṃ gandhakaṃ ca harabījaṃ ca tatsamam //
meṣaśṛṅgīṃ ca śṛṅgīṃ ca kṛṣṇonmattaṃ ca mārakam //
niṣiktaṃ tacca varte 'yaṃ tāraṃ bhavati śobhanam //

div.p: oṃ śrīnīlakaṇṭhāya ṭha ṭhaḥ | asyāyutaṃ japet |

lg.l: niryāse tu puṭaṃ kuryāt trivāraṃ hema śobhanam //
tayā saṃjīvitā daityā ye mṛtā devasaṃgare //
nikṣiptā martyaloke sā samyak te kathayāmyaham //
nadī godāvarī nāma prasiddhā jāhnavī yathā //
tasya mantraṃ pravakṣyāmi triṣu lokeṣu durlabham //

div.p: oṃ caṇḍāya pinākine śūlahastāya oṃ diśāṃ bandhaya vidiśāṃ bandhaya ṭhaṭhaḥ |
oṃ namo 'mṛte 'mṛtarūpiṇi amṛtaṃ me kuru kuru evaṃ rudra ājñāpayati svāhā |

lg.l: sa rasaḥ sarvalohāni ṣaṣṭyaṃśena tu vedhayet //
svedayet saptarātraṃ tu trilohena ca veṣṭayet //
payasā ca samāyuktaṃ nityamevaṃ tu kārayet //
tāraṃ cānena mārgeṇa niṣiktaṃ hematāṃ vrajet //
yāvat palaṃ tasya malaiḥ śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam //
eṣāṃ gandhāpahāraṃ yat kurute tacca vedhakam //
ekāhe vedhakaṃ tatra gokarṇe tu dinatrayam //
yaḥ svedaḥ patitastasmāj jātaṃ śailodakaṃ param //
dattvā lakṣaṃ japitvā tu gṛhṇīyādamṛtaṃ param //
māsamekaṃ tato mardyaṃ dehasiddhiṃ karoti ca //
madhu saṃyojya bhāṇḍasthaṃ bhūmau sarvaṃ nidhāpayet //
yadā bhavati tacchailaṃ gṛhītvā cūrṇayet tataḥ //
daradaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva sarvamekatra kārayet //
tena tāraṃ ca śulvaṃ ca kāñcanaṃ bhavati dhruvam //
taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre divyatvaṃ labhate dhruvam //
dhāryamāṇā mukhe sā tu sahasrāyuṣkarī bhavet //
krīḍate khecarair bhogaiḥ svecchayā śivatāṃ vrajet //
tadbaddhaṃ pāradaṃ caiva guṭikāṃ śṛṇu sundari //
triguṇe gandhake jīrṇe tena hema tu kārayet //
tadbhasma sūtake jāryaṃ rasendrasya same samam //
hāṭake sārayettaṃ tu guṭikāṃ tena kārayet //
yanmukhe caiva tadgolaṃ sa sarvarañjako bhavet //
ekīkṛtyātha tat sarvaṃ madhvājyena tu peṣayet //
ṣoḍaśe vatsare devi divyarūpaḥ sa jāyate //
ghṛtamadhusitayāḍhyaṃ vyoṣacitraṃ daśāṃśaṃ rasaphalarasasiddhaṃ lohajīrṇaṃ mṛtaṃ ca //
vigatasakaladoṣaḥ sarvadigdivyacakṣuḥ madana iva sukāntiḥ kāminīnāṃ pravīraḥ //
vṛṣabhagativiceṣṭaḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣaḥ suragaja iva loke śrāntihantāśu nityam //
triḥsaptarātraṃ dinamekamekaṃ sahasrajīvī vijayī naraḥ syāt //
rase rasāyane caiva lakṣavedhī na saṃśayaḥ //
taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre adṛśyo bhavati dhruvam //
rasenaiva tu kāle tu kuryādeva rasāyanam //
